result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp

When testing a column fixture, if the header row mentions a field that is not in the fixture, then the following message should appear in that cell:

Could not find field: fieldname.


  • Here is a fitnesse page that should generate the error
The !path must point to fitnesse.jar
ColumnFixtureTestFixture is a special class used for testing Column fixtures.
Action fixture
start Page builder
enter attributes Test=true
enter line !path ./classes
enter line !path ./fitnesse.jar
enter line |Import|
enter line |fitnesse.fixtures|
enter line  
enter line |Column fixture test fixture|
enter line |no such field|
enter page ColumnFixtureTestPage

Response Requester
uri status?
ColumnFixtureTestPage?test 200

  • The error message should show up in the response

Response examiner
type pattern matches? contents?
contents Could not find field: no such field true   HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Server: FitNesse-v20091014 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 979 <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"> <html> <head> <title>Test Results: ColumnFixtureTestPage</title> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/> <script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script> </head> <body> <div class="sidebar"> <div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div> <div class="actions"> <!--Test button--> <a class="page_title">ColumnFixtureTestPage</a> <br/> <span class="page_type">Test Results</span>  <a style="font-size:small;" href="ColumnFixtureTestPage?pageHistory"> [history]</a> </div> <div class="main"><div id="test-summary">Running Tests ...</div> e3 <div id="stop-test"> <a href="#" onclick="doSilentRequest('?responder=stoptest&id=1')"> <img src="/files/images/stop.gif"/> </a> <br/> <a href="#" onclick="doSilentRequest('?responder=stoptest&id=1')">Stop Test</a> </div> d5 <span class="meta">classpath: ./classes</span><br/><span class="meta">classpath: ./fitnesse.jar</span><br/><table border="1" cellspacing="0"> <tr><td>Import</td> </tr> <tr><td>fitnesse.fixtures</td> </tr> </table> d9 <br/><table border="1" cellspacing="0"> <tr><td>Column fixture test fixture</td> </tr> <tr><td class="error">no such field<hr/> <span class="fit_label">Could not find field: no such field.</span></td> </tr> </table> 46 <script>document.getElementById("stop-test").innerHTML = "";</script> cb <script>document.getElementById("test-summary").innerHTML = "<strong>Assertions:</strong> 0 right, 0 wrong, 0 ignored, 1 exceptions";document.getElementById("test-summary").className = Executed OK</a> </div> 21 </div> </div> </body> </html> 0 Exit-Code: 1
